detectors.description: Forward.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/ee07ac8708a6ea4f4a842cc064dab6e78e04f427_Forward.sol#71-74) uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: token.transferFrom(_from,_to,_value) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/ee07ac8708a6ea4f4a842cc064dab6e78e04f427_Forward.sol#72)
